Uses of Class
game.Behaviours

    • Uses of Behaviours in game

      Fields in game declared as Behaviours 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected Behaviours ZombieActor.behaviours
      a Behaviours object which stores a list of Behaviour that can be performed by the actor
      private static Behaviours Zombie.MOVING_BEHAVIOUR
      A constant Behaviours object which consists of a list of Behaviour objects which will change location of zombie
      Methods in game with parameters of type Behaviours 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void Behaviours.add(Behaviours behaviours)
      Appends the contents of another Behaviours list to this one.
      java.lang.Boolean Behaviours.hasBehaviour(Behaviours behaviours)
      Check if at least one of the behaviour in the behaviours arguments exists in behaviours from the collection.
      void Behaviours.remove(Behaviours behaviours)
      Remove the first occurrence of each Behaviour in behaviours from the collection, if it is present.
